title: Abbie Chatfield goes braless as she flaunts her trim figure in a see-through crop top and jeans
text:
She's recently confirmed she wants to be the next Bachelorette after failing to find love with Matt Agnew on The Bachelor, earlier this year.

And on Sunday, Abbie Chatfield made sure to turn heads as she went for a night stroll with a friend in Sydney's Kings Cross.

The 23-year-old put on an eye-popping display by going braless in a see-through white crop top.

Sheer daring! Abbie Chatfield went braless in a see-through crop top while out in Sydney's Kings Cross on Sunday... after confirming she wants to be the next Bachelorette

She teamed the tiny attire with high-waisted jeans that gave a glimpse of her toned stomach.

Nude strappy sandals and a matching nude bag, as well as a white sheer shirt, rounded out the ensemble.

The reality TV star wore her curly locks out and over her shoulders, with the front layers pulled back and off her face. She appeared makeup free.

If you've got it! She teamed the tiny attire with high-waisted jeans that gave a glimpse of her toned stomach

She's got a glow! The reality TV star wore her curly locks out and over her shoulders, with the front layers pulled back and off her face. She appeared makeup free

Girls' night! Abbie appeared in high spirits during the outing, as she and her friend strolled around and picked up some goodies at a store

Abbie appeared in high spirits during the outing, as she and her friend strolled around and picked up some goodies at a store.

The blonde also posed up in the same outfit this week, joking on Instagram that she was dressed as Miley Cyrus.

'If I keep dressing like Miley do you think Liam will give me a shot?' she captioned a post of herself wearing the jeans and crop top.

'Do you think Liam will give me a shot?' The blonde also posed up in the same outfit this week, joking on Instagram that she was dressed as Miley Cyrus

Looking for love! Meanwhile, Abbie recently told The Daily Telegraph that she wants to be the next Bachelorette, despite being caught kissing Bachelor's Todd King recently

Meanwhile, Abbie recently told The Daily Telegraph that she wants to be the next Bachelorette, despite being caught kissing Bachelor's Todd King recently.

'I would love to be The Bachelorette,' she told the publication over the weekend.

'But I think it's a really hard gig because you're basically by yourself… I'd definitely consider (it though), I think it would be lots of fun.'

Abbie made it to the finale of The Bachelor earlier this year, but was left heartbroken when astrophysicist Matt chose Chelsie McLeod instead.
description: She's just confirmed that she wants to be the next Bachelorette, after failing to find love with Matt Agnew on The Bachelor earlier this year.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
